description:
Layer up to take on changing conditions with this technical pullover. Ideal for approaches and all-day hikes, the R1 CrossStrata is long on warmth and short on weight. Outstanding stretch won’t limit your range of motion when you're hiking, scrambling or climbing.

  • Made of recycled polyester and spandex stretch double-weave fabric that adds warmth but breathes well to avoid overheating
  • Fabric is wind and water resistant thanks to a PFC-free DWR finish
  • Stretch fabric is designed for overhead reach and a wide range of movement
  • Deep zip-neck for venting with a soft kissing-welt zipper garage at chin for next-to-skin comfort
  • Center drop-in, zippered pocket keeps essentials secure, and the kangaroo pocket warms hands and sits above a harness
  • Partially elasticized, low-profile cuffs resist snagging
name: Patagonia R1 CrossStrata Pullover - Unisex
